arts.ttl: Granit Xhaka: "We made it easy for ourselves"
arts.sum: Granit Xhaka was naturally pleased with Bayer Leverkusen's performance against RB Salzburg.

arts.ttl: Artem Stepanov: Who is the youngster helping Bayer Leverkusen's striker crisis?
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen have a mini crisis in the striker department with Patrik Schick being the only senior available, Xabi Alonso has turned to the youth and Artem Stepanov could be one making his debut fairly soon.. Stepanov would waste little time in making an impression, making 21 appearances for the U17 Bundesliga West side, scoring eight goals and providing four assists during the 2022/23 season.

arts.ttl: Wirtz wonderful as five-star Leverkusen crush Salzburg
arts.sum: Xabi Alonso's side returned to UEFA Champions League action and played host to RB Salzburg. A 5-0 win yielded all three points for Die Werkself on Matchday 5.

arts.ttl: Victor Boniface expected to REJECT Man Utd transfer
arts.sum: Manchester United are reportedly eager to sign Bayer Leverkusen forward Victor Boniface in 2025, but the Nigeria international is expected to reject a transfer to Old Trafford. Joshua Zirkzee has been touted to leave Old Trafford in 2025, after a dismal start to life in the Premier League, and Man Utd have shortlisted Boniface as one possible replacement option.

arts.ttl: Confirmed lineups: Bayer Leverkusen vs. RB Salzburg
arts.sum: Official team news has just been released for Die Werkself who welcome Austrian opposition Red Bull Salzburg to the BayArena for Matchday 5 of the UEFA Champions League.

arts.ttl: Report: Schick open to leaving Leverkusen in January
arts.sum: According to Sky Germany, Patrik Schick is unhappy with his situation at Bayer Leverkusen - and his recent hat-trick hasn't changed that.

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen go head-to-head with Arsenal and Tottenham for talented wonderkid
arts.sum: According to Patrick Berger, Bayer Leverkusen, alongside a number of other Bundesliga sides, are looking to go head-to-head with Arsenal and Tottenham for the talented wonderkid Bazoumana Touré. It is…

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen vs. RB Salzburg preview: Team news and predicted lineups
arts.sum: Here is our preview of Tuesday's UEFA Champions League clash between Bayer Leverkusen and RB Salzburg, including our predicted lineups.

arts.ttl: Leverkusen include 16-year-old in squad to face Salzburg amid injury woes
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen's injury crisis has prompted Xabi Alonso to name three youth team players in his squad for the Champions League clash with RB Salzburg. One of them is 16-year-old Ben Hawighorst.
Aidan Perkins looks ahead to all 18 games in the Champions League this week and has a score prediction for each clash.
